about_the_game:
Kinky Cosplay Heroes is part of the same idler franchise as our other game, Cafe Maid, but we've made it faster-paced and more adult-focused. We believe both new players and fans of the previous game will enjoy what it has to offer, with a mix of familiar mechanics and plenty of new content.



Overview

Have you ever dreamed about being indulged by a superhero? How about by a harem of them? In Kinky Cosplay Heroes you can live that dream to the fullest.

In this idle game, you take on the role of a streaming studio owner, tasked with managing the studio, streamers, and collecting their earnings.

Flirt with the girls upgrade and customize the studio and turn it into the perfect lewd establishment.

Idler Gameplay

In Hentai Cosplay Heroes, your studio makes money even while you are AFK (eg. while you are shaving or watching your favourite movies IRL), and when you come back you can spend all that to make your studio the biggest success around the globe.

Cute Cosplay Hereos

Gather the cutest talent you can possibly imagine around yourself. Hire a sex maniac streamer and many more. All of these beauties are dying to get to know you. They are very receptive to your flirting and just love everything you can provide, especially if it involves one of your special private trainings.

Incremental gameplay

Tap the streamers to collect money, upgrade their spots so that they can entertain the guests even more and earn more money. After a time you will be able to automatize this process, freeing up your hands to do something else... for example to hire new streamers to do new functions in the studio, or to help them to provide special services to the customers in one of the back rooms.

When your current studio is successful enough you can decide to sell it to another investor and get a big profit in return that you can spend on the streamers or on managing your brand. Your decisions determine how much more efficiently will your next company earn money.

Key Features

  • An enjoyable fusion of idle & clicker gameplay

  • 9+ cute anime streamers, with different personalities, backgrounds and hot kinks!

  • 30+ pieces of furniture to upgrade and customize your cafe

  • Dozens of sexy clothes for your streamers to wear

  • Exciting events featuring one of your streamers: new flirts, new clothes, and a lot of sex

  • High quality, steaming hot 3D hentai sex scenes! Fully animated! HARDCORE!

content_descriptors.notes:
The whole game revolve around sexuality e.g.
* the icons and user interface
* the story 
* the characters
* the adult cutscenes

In some scene interactions between 2 or more adults are shown.  The erotic movements and nudity of women are  frequent in the game. In the dialogues the sexuality also there in a mid level.

No violence and drug in the game.

name: Kinky Cosplay Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL® Pentium Dual Core G3250
  • Graphics: Any with dx11 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

short_description: Start your own sexy idler streaming studio, filling your staff with cute anime girls. Flirt with the girls, win their hearts, dress them up in the cutest outfits... And have fun with them in various sex scenes, all the while your business grows even while you are away.
